Text: Potential Business OpportunityEnjoyed seeing you at the Masters and hope we can do it again in Ive taken the liberty to attach below the name of an individual who has a distinguished business career and since leaving Pittston as an executive VP in has started his on fund as well as developing other business ventures He is very well connected and highly regarded in the Wall Street financial community I dont know where it may lead but I am of the opinion it would be of benefit for you both to at least have a discussion and explore opportunities I look forward to your next visit to BMR and also hearing the outcome of your discussion with Gary Regards Ed Bolton Gary R Rogliano Chief Executive Officer Snowmagic Entertainment Wall Street West Lyndhurst New Jersey phone fax cell phone email
